name: Saimazoom
overview: Johnny goes back to the jungle in this remake of his very first adventure. Wild rivers, savage canibals, poisonous snakes, dark shrines and coffe, lots of coffe... a tasty one! All the spirit from the classic Dinamic game but boosting to the limits the MSX system: new original music composed for the remake, a full graphic restyling, special effects using hardware sprites... Jhonny Jones hits stronger as never before!
